body.name: Head & Shoulders Royal Oils Dandruff Shampoo & Conditioner Set with Coconut Oil and Apple Cider Vinegar, Curly Hair Products, 31.4 Oz Each
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 39 mins
features: You Will Receive one 31.4 fl oz. Bottle of shampoo and one 31.4 fl oz. Bottle of conditioner
Expertly designed scalp Relief for natural, curly, and coily crowns
Healthier scalp, healthier hair in 3 weeks.
Royal oils moisture boost Shampoo and moisture Renewal Conditioner balance scalp and restore moisture (with regular use)
This balanced, moisturizing formula provides long-lasting relief from scalp dryness and itch
body.description: Start wash day off right and indulge in the long-lasting scalp Relief and hydration of royal oils by Head & Shoulders Moisture boost Shampoo with coconut oil and apple cider Vinegar. This balanced, moisturizing formula provides long-lasting relief from scalp dryness and itch while giving hair the hydration it needs to look and feel its most beautiful. Made without compromise and free of parabens or dyes, it's the perfect way to soothe and nourish natural, curly, and coily hair types. Indulge your scalp and hair with the decadent moisture of royal oils by Head & Shoulders Moisture Renewal Conditioner with coconut oil and apple cider Vinegar. Starting on day 1, This moisturizing formula helps balance essential scalp moisture giving you long-lasting protection. Use it on wash days after shampooing to soak scalp in lasting moisture. This Paraben and dye-free conditioner is the perfect way to give all natural, curly and coily hair types A boost of lasting nourishment and scalp protection.The shampoo & Conditioner system are safe to use on color treated, curly or textured hair types, compared to a non-conditioning shampoo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for deep-cleaning natural hair
reviews.reviewText: My daughter has natural hair and sometimes product buildup leaves flakes in her hair or sometimes she gets an itchy scalp. This Head and Shoulders Royal Oils shampoo does a superb job of deep-cleaning her hair without stripping it. I love the way it leaves her hair shiny clean and healthy looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my son and in less than 2 weeks saw a huge improvement in the appearance of his hair. Looks so much healthier! He really likes it too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Treats dandruff without drying hair out.
reviews.reviewText: I have tried all the dandruff shampoos and they all left my hair (thick, wavy and a little corse) dried out and frizzy. This has not only helped to control the itchy scalp and scaly dandruff but left my hair soft and manageable. I have recommended to several people.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: es la segunda vez que compro este pack, mi cabello se reseca mucho y me sirve, otros productos HS me resecan mucho el cabello, pero este modelo especifico no me maltrata el cabello

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product! Terrible packaging!
reviews.reviewText: Terrible packaging! I love this shampoo and conditioner. It’s the only thing that “fixed” my hair after lots of bleaching. However… This item was delivered packed in a thin plastic mailer. Not even any bubble wrap for some kind of protection. The edges are dented in and have a small crack which allowed for product to leak out. The front of one of the bottles looks like it was thrown and skidded across asphalt. Smh. I will definitely buy again, but I hope there will be more thought into how this is packaged in the future.

reviews.reviewText: Been using this for a year or so now (every other wash day) and it has been the only thing to really help decrease my dandruff extremely!
